content:
Can you use your Go programming skills to recommend the cryptocurrency with the highest potential for growth in the next few years based on the given table data? Remember to consider market cap and 24h volume, and only select cryptocurrencies with a market cap greater than 10,000 and 24h volume greater than 1,000. Here is the table:
| Cryptocurrency | Price (USD) | Market Cap (USD) | 24h Volume (USD) |
|----------------|-------------|------------------|------------------|
| X | 0.01 | 10,000 | 1,000 |
| Y | 0.02 | 5,000 | 500 |
| Z | 0.05 | 20,000 | 2,000 |
| A | 0.01 | 2,500 | 100 |
| B | 0.03 | 15,000 | 1,500 |
| C | 0.01 | 3,000 | 300 |
| D | 0.04 | 12,000 | 1,200 |
Can you write a Go code that applies the formula and filters the data to recommend the cryptocurrency with the highest potential for growth?
